text.div:
Generated Narrative: ValueSet R5-medicationrequest-admin-location-for-R4

This value set expansion contains 3 concepts.

SystemVersionCodeDisplayDefinition
http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/medicationrequest-admin-location0.1.0  communityCommunityIncludes requests for medications to be administered or consumed by the patient in their home (this would include long term care or nursing homes, hospices, etc.)
http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/medicationrequest-admin-location0.1.0  inpatientInpatientIncludes requests for medications to be administered or consumed in an inpatient or acute care setting
http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/medicationrequest-admin-location0.1.0  outpatientOutpatientIncludes requests for medications to be administered or consumed in an outpatient setting (for example, Emergency Department, Outpatient Clinic, Outpatient Surgery, Doctor's office)

name: R5MedicationrequestAdminLocationForR4
title: Cross-version ValueSet R5.MedicationRequestAdministrationLocationCodes for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents content from `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/medicationrequest-admin-location|5.0.0` for use in FHIR R4.
purpose:
This value set is part of the cross-version definitions generated to enable use of the
value set `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/medicationrequest-admin-location|5.0.0` as defined in FHIR R5
in FHIR R4.

The source value set is bound to the following FHIR R5 elements:
* `MedicationRequest.category`
* `MedicationStatement.category`

The following concepts are not included in this cross-version definition because they have valid representations
* _no concepts_

Following are the generation technical comments:

FHIR ValueSet `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/medicationrequest-admin-location|5.0.0`, defined in FHIR R5 does not have any mapping to FHIR R4
